posts.post_content:
Following are for sale,

A bit of everything from this difficult set, all SGC graded. 
While all the cards are difficult in this set, some of these are extremely tough to find.
Attached a few scans to get the gist, happy to send others by email.

if you happen to be looking for a certain player from this set, just lmk as I have others as well (just not the biggies for the most part).

any questions, just ask...thanks ~ Rob

Ames 50 - $1050
Doyle 60 - $925
Jordan 35 - $600 SOLD
Rucker 30 - $500  SOLD
Baker 40 - $1750 SOLD
Crawford 30  - $1650
Jennings 40 - $1450
McGraw  50 - $4700 factory 8 overprint
Donovan  60 ~ $925
Doolan 30 - $500
Huggins 40 - $1250 SOLD
Thomas 40 - $650
Mcquillan 40 - $575
Quinn 30 - $500
Dubuc raw G/VG - $400

Bender SGC 30 overprint- $2400
Zimmerman SGC 50 - $925
Mowrey PSA 6 - $1100
Reulbach SGC 50 - $850

Bump,

Looking to move these, have too many.
Will consider offers, especially on multiple cards.

Thanks ~ Rob
Please PM me particulars if you have him.  Thanks.  Also looking for T213-1 Wilson
That McGraw Factory 8 OP is a beast!
Haha, thanks Ryan ... it's actually a pretty high grade for an O/P.

Rob- I believe the provenance on the McGraw overprint is that I originally found it in a large collection of T213-3s in the early 80"s in what was later called the 'Southern Find.' I was able to put the complete set together all in vg/ex or better condition. There were 8 Overprints, 2 Cobbs, 2 McGraws and I forget the other 4 players in the Find. I sold the complete set to Bill Mastro in around 1985-1990 and kept the two OP Cobbs and one McGraw and had all 3 slabbed by SGC. Sold the McGraw which is I believe is the same card you are selling and sold 1 Cobb OP through Net54 and traded the other for an E94 Wagner in a PSA 5, years ago. 
Hope you are doing well.
TBob

Consolidated a couple lists, any questions or scans needed pls ask.
thanks ~ Rob
